name: MoonPact (Jam Version)
description:
Submission for the Pizza Jam ! Theme : Compensation for a Miracle.

Find your way and burst masks through a randomly layed out tower, in order to defeat the elder sorcerer using the moon's power.

Controls :

- Direction/Jump : Arrow Keys 

- Moon Jump : Up in middle air (-1 Heart)

- Spell : Left Click

- Moon Spell : Right Click (-1 Heart)

- Moon Stun : Down key (-2 Heart)

- Skip Text : Space
